Name: Escape
About the game: Escape is a small 2D strategy game where you have to go through different rooms. Each rooms has a finish point and you need to manage to go to that point without dying. The game is quit simple, it can be finished very quickly depending on your jumping skills ! There are a total of 35 levels. All the levels are already unlocked and ready to be played. You can put your own favorite music as there is none in this game. Enjoy :) Please report any bug at this adress : escapeinformation@gmail.com
